name: SkyTeam Lounge Sydney

access.notes: Passengers flying Business Class on any SkyTeam member airline
SkyTeam Elite+ members (e.g., Delta Diamond Medallion, Flying Blue Platinum)
Passengers flying First Class on eligible SkyTeam member airlines
Delta Concierge Key members (when flying Delta)

hours.notes: Aligned with morning/early afternoon international departures

notes: No paid entry available. Lounge operated by SkyTeam partner airline.
